import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get ticket activity by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/activities/{ticketActivityId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the complete details of a specific ticket activity by its identifier. Activities include comments, status changes, assignments, attachments, and other timeline events.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketActivityId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) to view the ticket's activity history and extract `TicketActivityId` from timeline entries.

**Workflow Example**
1. View timeline: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) → identify activity of interest
2. Get details: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/activities/\{ticketActivityId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-activity-by-id)
3. Process: Use activity data for display, audit, or integration purposes

**Response Contents**: Returns the activity type, creator, timestamp, content (comment text, field changes), visibility settings, and any attachments.

**Use Cases**: Activity detail views, audit logging, activity-triggered integrations.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) – View full activity history
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/activities/\{ticketActivityId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-activity) – Edit activity
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/activities/\{ticketActivityId\}](/docs/api/tickets/delete-ticket-activity) – Delete activity

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}

</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"ticketActivityId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket activity","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
